attributes.action: immediately repatriate Fowzi Nejad to Iran on the grounds that he is mortal danger from taxpaying pensioners in this country who are receiving less in welfare benefits than he is, while they are funding HIS life of luxury under threat of being criminalised and are not prepared to put up with that situation for very much longer, therefore it will be MUCH safer for him if he were to be sent back to Iran.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
